sentences.english: One of the classic comedies of Sichuanese comedian, Li Boqing…

sentences.english: Elite Sanshou players were more pliable than the general players.

sentences.english: There are different sorts of strength of Sanda .
sentences.chinese: 武術散打力量有不同的分類。

sentences.english: In 2002, Qianlong Budokan was hired as head coach of Sanda.
sentences.chinese: 2002年被潛龍武道館聘爲散打主教練。

sentences.english: The winter training result is evaluated by monitoring multi-indicators of Sanda sportsmen.
sentences.chinese: 通過監測散打運動員身體多項指標評定冬訓訓練效果。

sentences.english: Sanda of the origin and development of the Chinese nation and a long history of sync.
sentences.chinese: 散打的起源與發展，和中華民族的悠久歷史同步。

sentences.english: Correlate costume of sport of Sanda look simple and not individual.
sentences.chinese: 散打運動的相關服裝顯得簡單，沒有個性。

sentences.english: Proposed that the martial arts kick boxing movement takes road of the popular is its development steady road.
sentences.chinese: 武術散打運動走大衆化之路，纔是其發展的平穩之道。

sentences.english: The rule of free combat has been gone through from scratch, is revising the perfect course constantly.
sentences.chinese: 散打規則經歷了從無到有，不斷修改完善的過程。

sentences.english: Lily: She also like free combat and Muay Thai.
Athletic injury is the main factor impact on professional Sanda athlete's life of athletics.
sentences.chinese: 運動損傷是影響專業散打運動員運動壽命的主要因素。

sentences.english: With the development of Sanda, physical attention by more and more people.
sentences.chinese: 隨着散打運動的發展，身體素質越來越被人們所重視。

sentences.english: The competition will be conducted in accordance with the latest edition of the Rules for the International Wushu Sanshou Competition.
sentences.chinese: 比賽採用國際武聯審定的最新《武術散打競賽規則》。

sentences.english: Tactical awareness is a major factor influencing the Sanshou players performances.
sentences.chinese: 戰術意識是影響散打運動員獲取優異成績的重要因素。

sentences.english: She also like free combat and Muay Thai.

definition: to fight, esp. with hands/wrestling (as a sport)/to wrestle/to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc)/to capture prey

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
